ComicInfo.Penciller: Dave Johnson,Mark Wheatley,Michael Avon Oeming,Michael Avon Oeming
ComicInfo.Summary:
It took an extra issue, but all your questions are answered here. Every battle will be fought! Thorr and the Gods of Asgard face down the Giants in a bloody blow-down that lasts for weeks! But will Modi survive? Will Loki offer help or harm? Will you love the great cover by Dave Johnson? Of course you will!
